    reduces the number of lives when 3 lives have been lost, display a game over message on the scene if the game is not yet over, reset the position of the bird to position before collision

    moveBird()
    enters autopilot mode when applicable animates the bird graphic as the Start Game button is clicked if the button is unclicked, implements dropping of the bird

    moves the bottom half of the pipes horizontally along the scene moves the eggs alond with the bottom pipes randomizes the appearance of eggs
